snippet.title: Madshot: Road to Madness - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Madshot: Road to Madness is available now on Steam: https://bit.ly/MadshotRoadToMadness

Slaughter endless abominations while moving stylishly through a Lovecraftian nightmare. Combine a multitude of unlockable weapons, abilities and upgrades in order to survive as long as possible, and reach the top of the leaderboards.

👁 You are in Control - Doge, roll, dash, wall jump, flip while simultaneously shooting. 
👁  Endless hordes - Slaughter, Subdue, and control endless hordes of enemies. Get the highest score possible and climb the online leaderboards.
👁  Create lethal combinations - There's a big focus on synergies between unlockable weapons, sidearms, upgrades, and ultimate abilities. 

Madshot: Road to Madness it's a spin-off title from the original Madshot.

- - - -

Madshot on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MadshotTheGame
Madshot on Discord: https://discord.gg/ta64VUv6gx
HOOK on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HOOKcrew  
HOOK on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HOOKcrew  
HOOK on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hookcrew_
HOOK on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@hookcrew
